entry.title: What The Light Brings Back
entry.summary:
Author: ThePacemGirl

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,236Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 64

Summary: In the heart of a modern Albion, nestled near the still waters of Avalon, Merlin runs a quiet orphanage—far from the prophecies, far from the crown. It’s a place of hope and new beginnings for the children in his care. But not today.Today marks exactly 1,500 years since Arthur Pendragon died and killed Merlin’s soul.While the orphanage bustles with excitement for Parents’ Day, Merlin can barely hold himself together. The sun is too bright. The children’s laughter cuts too deep. And still, he has no choice but to smile for them.What Merlin doesn’t know is that fate is already shifting. Because Arthur is about to rise again.
